entry.summary:
1.4.2 release goes with Create React App support and better typescript typings for the ttag lib.

Read more about how you can use ttag with CRA.

This release goes also with macro support for babel-plugin-ttag.

entry.title: 1.3.x release
entry.summary: 1.3.x release comes with a couple important changes. All changes are not breaking, but here are a couple of things you should now before upgrade.

entry.title: Why there must be a msgid tag in ngettext?
entry.summary:
From the first glance, it is not clear why we should use msgid tag for the first argument of ngettext function.

The main reason for this is to be able to use ttag without babel transpile.

entry.title: Localization setup with babel-plugin-ttag and webpack (the hard way)
entry.summary: This post will describe hardcore but flexible setup with webpack and babel-plugin-ttag (without ttag-cli). We recommend to use simpler approach with ttag-cli, but if you want more flexibility in your translation process - this post is for you.
